title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Apr 30 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Apr 30 2022
description:
Elon Musk moves closer to saving free speech on Twitter. Clay says, "Elon Musk managed to put spaceships into space better than NASA... He can probably figure out how to work Twitter in a more effective manner." Should Trump go back to Twitter? Both Clay and Buck say he might be better off without it, and Buck recalls the explosive social media reaction the many times Trump retweeted him. Facing election annihilation, Dems double down on failure, attacks. Stelter: We may never know if CNN+ was a success or failure. Clay and Buck encourage Stelter to call in to the show, say it would expose him to many more people than his own show does.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
